attributes.action: Improve awareness and stimulate research of auto-immune conditions and the debilitating effect it has on sufferers of all ages including children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think people need to know more about autoimmune diseases in general. Most people have no idea how deadly they can be. For example, when I tell people I have rheumatoid arthritis they say they have a bad knee too. Or they say try Aloe Vera. They have no idea how deadly high inflammation is. That is what most of these autoimmune disease have in common,inflammation. Inflammation is one of the big reasons that these diseases can be deadly.
